title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: When importing a new image into the layout, the expected result is that the new image is displayed. However, after importing the new image1.jpg into the layout, the actual result is that the original image is still displayed.
EB: To reproduce the issue: 1. Import a new image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout. 2. Verify that the new image is displayed. 3. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image. 4. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
SR: The steps to reproduce the issue are as follows: 1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view. 2. Delete this image file from the outline image. 3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
